author: Deccan
title: Rohit Shetty becomes the highest paid Bollywood director!
text:
Deccan Chronicle | October 07, 2015, 14.53 pm Mumbai: Rohit Shetty, who is currently busy shooting for his much anticipated film ‘Dilwale’, has reportedly become the highest paid director in Bollywood.
According to latest buzz, Rohit Shetty has been offered a whopping amount of Rs. 25-crore for his next directorial venture. This is the highest amount ever paid to any Bollywood filmmaker. Producer Sangeeta Ahir has reportedly brought Rohit Shetty on board to director Tamil film ‘Soodhu Kavvum’s remake version.
Rohit Shetty will start working on the film, which is said to be a comedy one, once he returns from Hyderabad and finalizes everything.
Currently, the director is filming ‘Dilwale’ with Shah Rukh Khan, Kajol, Varun Dhawan and Kriti Sanon in Hyderabad.
